inn1.comm: moved in appreciably from short of a length, Cook eyeing the punch with the original angle across him, but it has cut back to surprise him, off the glove onto the pitch
on the pads, pitched up, and Cook is away with a tuck through square leg
tight, nippy, good length delivery outside the off stump, Bell beaten as he pushes at it
comes back in from a length outside off now, blocked
pitched up, hint of straightening, pushed back to the bowler
pitches it just short of a good length and sends it down the leg side as it moves in
back of a length, starting wide outside off but there is inswing, lots of it, Bell getting a thick inside edge as he defends from the crease
pitched up, slight angle across the left-hander, straightens into him, defended off the front foot
fuller, on the stumps, and Cook uses the inward shape to send it between mid on and midwicket, it keeps gathering pace and beats the chasing men to the rope
going across, 139.1 kph, and lifting neatly from a just back of a good length, left alone
140.5 kph now, fuller too, similar angle and Cook lets it go
tight line, ending on off stump, 134.8 kph good length, Cook right forward to block it
went full for the stumps, slight inswing, Cook getting bat around pad to work it square, direct hit from the man there could have caught the wandering Bell short
holds its line and bounces from a length outside off, width available, but Bell punches it to point
130 kph, slight inward angle, slight away shape, outside off, good carry, Bell lets it go
pitched up, brings him forward, holds its line, and is played out to point
staying quite some way outside the off stump, and the good length delivery bounces in front of Dhoni
carries alright this time into Dhoni's gloves, Bell not going after all these length balls outside off
similar length, and then this one comes back in, Bell judges well and shoulders arms
punches a length ball just outside off to extra cover
pitched up for the drive, Cook not going for it, the ball straightens as it approaches Dhoni at around chest height
on middle, good length, Cook plays it out to the off side
full, just outside off stump, zips into Dhoni's gloves as Cook keeps leaving them
141 kph now from Shami, that is quick, Cook defends the length ball down the pitch
has him pushing now outside off stump, it is played in the gap at cover, but Rahane is quick to reach it
back of a length, punched from the crease to mid on
excellent, Bhuvneshwar giving Cook width with the angle, and Cook bends his knees, and flays it past cover
pushed firmly off the front foot around mid off, Yuvraj runs across and dives to keep them to one
pitched up, thick outside edge as he drives, past the two slips, third man is square but cuts it off in the end
bounce from a good length, 129.2 kph, Cook hurriedly plays it out to point
some width from short of a length, and Cook tries to hit it through covers from the crease, beaten
good line, pitched up, outside off, slight away shape, but Bell is not falling for it
on the off stump now, good length, Bell defends to the off side
appeal for caught behind down the leg side from the keeper, bowler not going up, Bell coming across and trying to nudge, off the thigh pad, show replays, it has been called a wide
straightish outside off stump, Bell now walking across the stumps, and a few steps outside the crease, lets it go, the ball swings in sharply as it nears Dhoni
back of a length now, fine change from Shami, Bell looking to come out, has to stop and defend
slight away movement at 140 kph, Bell mistimes the drive, taking a hand off the bat as he goes across
good length, pushed firmly this time but straight to point
angle taking it on middle from outside leg, Cook pushing it straight back, bowler getting a hand to it
mid off is wide, and Cook has shuffled across, moved down the pitch a bit and sent this length ball past a sprawling Yuvraj
pitched up, Cook goes hard at the cover drive, the thick inside edge sends the ball scooting past square leg
Cook looking to find some runs now, square drive, but there is a man at short cover-point, Raina it is, and he gets a hand to it on the bounce
driven, but cannot beat extra cover on the edge of the circle
so he tries to go leg side, walking across the stumps early, but cannot work the length ball past midwicket
England have been tied down, and it is Bell's turn to try and break free now, charges out to a length ball but can find no worthwhile connection, ball rolls to off
outside off and short, too short says the square leg umpire
135.5 kph length ball on the pads and Bell helps himself to a couple with a flick in the air through square leg
pitched up, pushed softly in front of cover, and that is a very well-judged single from Cook., who beats Rahane's lob quite easily
cannot put it away, straight on the pads, Cook misses
holds its line from a good length, middle and leg, worked to square leg

gone leg-before, Shami giving the crowd reason to cheer, the pressure of tight bowling making Cook walk across trying to flick a length ball from off through square leg, it straightens appreciably, Cook misses, is hit in line with off and middle, that looked alright
another appeal for lbw, Bell caught on the back leg with one that came in a mile from wide outside off, but catching him on the thigh pad
super response from Bell, not much width, but he is able to cut it past point, no chance for third man
down the leg side with the inward shape
holding its line outside off, played out to point
moving down the pitch outside off stump, but not enough room to guide it past the man at point
flailing outside off stump, but beaten by the inward seam movement on this length ball
excellent control, this one holds its line from almost the same spot, Bell more watchful now, lets it go
sharp, bouncer outside off stump, 137 kph, KP withdrawing from the pull
and again, short ball has KP hopping, moving his head away and dropping his wrists
pitched up this time, leg sidish though and it is tucked wide of fine leg
played out to point as it straightens from a length
bowled full, Bell in the crease and defends tightly as it holds its line on off
too wide, and rightly smashed away by Bell, but Jadeja at point saves a certain boundary with a dive to his right, took most of the sting out of it
the KP wrists send a length ball from outside off to deep square leg
Bell is trying hard to get going, just not working at the moment, charges out, the ball swings in from a length, and he mistimes it to mid on
outstanding, this goes the other way now, Bell beaten as he opens the face
sprayed too far outside off stump and Bell is only too happy to slap it past extra cover
Bell charges out once more, Bhuvneshwar digs it in, Bell has a go at it, and the top edge flies to the fine leg rope
sensible now from Bell, opens the face to run a length ball to third man
good length, on the pads, away to fine leg
Ishant imploring for lbw, KP on the walk across and down the pitch, hit probably just outside the line of off with inward seam, too far outside the crease too
worked to midwicket for one
overpitched, 134 kph, and KP moves forward to dismiss it past a diving wide mid off
another boundary, Ishant already leaking runs, overpitched once more, on the stumps, and KP uses the angle to whip it to the deep midwicket rope, lovely timing
fine comeback from Ishant, beats him on the drive with one that holds its line outside off
length ball around the pads, worked behind square
pitched up, widish outside off, KP has a look at it as he withdraws the bat
too much with the angle this time, and catches the pads on its way fine to the rope down leg
this time it ends on middle, KP getting far across but unable to force it to midwicket
Yuvraj saves a boundary with a slide to his right at wide mid on, KP had wristed it from outside off in that direction, and the timing was not bad at all
steered to third man
on off and middle, defended off the front foot
turn away from off stump, good length, worked to long on
angled in down the pads, nudged to short fine
good length, and straightening, steers it to point
coming in this time, Bell gets bat down quickly to work it square to leg
pushes forward, thick inside edge to square leg as it straightens on middle and leg, steady from Jadeja in the first over
starts well with one that cuts back in from a length outside off, left alone
tight line just outside off, good length, coming in, defended to leg off a thick inside edge
opens the face as he squeezes a pitched up delivery past a diving cover, sweeper gets to it
lift from a length, straight outside off, left alone

Ishant has the big wicket, KP is walking back shaking his head, after standing rooted in disbelief for several seconds, he was on the walk down the pitch, the ball reared and straightened from back of a length, Dhoni went up immediately, there was a noise, need more replays, had to be bat hitting pad, ball brushed the trouser too on its way to Dhoni, no edge at all, KP's form bowing to his bad luck
goes full for the stumps, pushed out to mid off
wide length ball outside off, he misses with the cut
Bhuvneshwar striking now, Bell trying to cut one that moved in from a length, clear outside edge and Dhoni has a sharp take standing up
defended down the pitch off the front foot
right forward to defend a length ball to off
bounce from a length, pushed to extra cover
comes in from outside off, good length, Root is shouldering arms
touch late in getting forward to block a pitched up delivery, no harm in the end
thick outside edge runs behind point, Yuvraj;s dive cannot prevent the single
solid forward stride and defence from Morgan, to short extra
steps down the pitch, opens the face and runs it to point
pitched up, going across, and allowed to do so
goes back to a length ball outside off and stabs it towards point
tries to steer it with hard hands, beaten outside off
good length, takes a step out and shoulders arms
goes across and defends a nippy one to mid on
has him reaching out at a widish pitched up delivery, and Root is beaten
this time he will not let it go, too wide, and he puts it away through point, Ishant was at square third man, was too quick for him
walking out is Morgan to shortish one, and jabbing a thick inside edge out to fine leg
pushes forward and squeezes a length ball behind point
ishant is finding the zip from short of a length that makes him effective, bouncing, coming in and beating the inside edge
good length now, Morgan stretching forward to push to mid off

picture perfect from Morgan, he has been moving forward superbly, this time he's also pinged the gap between extra cover and mid off, one of those where nobody needs to move, even the batsman, he gets to hold the pose as he watches the ball disappear
short, on the pads and he drags an awkward  pull to fine leg
slithering across, down the pitch, and shouldering arms to a lifting length ball
too much with the angle across the left-hander
drives at a full one, thick outside edge flies to square third man
reaches out to a widish full one and finds the sweeper for one
lets it go outside off with the angle across him
full, some movement into the left-hander, flicked behind square from middle and leg
good length, played from the crease, squeezed out to point, and Bhuvneshwar shows enough energy after ten overs on the trot by running up the pitch to cover for the throw
Morgan is eager to drive, he's beaten now as he goes fiddling with a quite wide one
another attempted drive, and again he nearly gets into trouble, it holds its line and Morgan inside-edges it on to pad
banged in short, and down the leg side
not full enough to draw him out now, played out to point
right on middle stump, Morgan squared up, but manages to play it straight back in the end
pitched up, and left alone outside off
tight line on off stump, bounce too, played back to the bowler
beats him first ball with a tossed up delivery outside off which does not turn as much as Root expected it to
and then he sends one down leg second ball
pitched up, pushed to midwicket
slog-swept, full and outside off, dismissed to the deep midwicket rope
slows it up, Root moves across and works the length ball to midwicket

quite strange all-round, Ashwin, who just can't seem to bowl the same delivery on successive occasions, digs in a carrom ball shortish and down the leg side, Root now thinks of a reverse paddle, then tries a reverse steer, is beaten, and there is an appeal for stumping too, but Root's back foot is in
stays in the crease and stabs a length ball away from the stumps
front foot goes out confidently and Morgan defends a length ball quite solidly
down the pitch but ends up working it back to the bowler
and another big stride forward smothers the pitched up delivery to the off side
Morgan has been beaten a few times already on the drive, here he is again, reaching out to one pitched up for the shot
quick single taken in front of mid on
dispatched to the straight boundary past mid off, Root walking out and beating mid off with a crisp drive
works an incoming delivery with the angle, but midwicket cuts it off
nudges a length ball in front of square leg
tossed up slowly and goes straight on, he waits and dabs it late to short third

Morgan's fallen to the reverse sweep, he's spooned it in the air from around leg stump to backward point, what a waste of an important wicket, which it always is when all these cute shots don't come off
short, down the pads to a new batsman, played out to midwicket
bowled fuller and slower, nudged to the leg side
pushed down to long on for one

this won't do Kieswetter's case any good, lunging forward, leaving a gap between bat and pad, and Jadeja;s flighted arm ball has sneaked in, excellent delivery but Kieswetter not helping himself by bringing the bat down from that angle
right forward and smothers one straightening on off
goes deep in the crease to defend
that looked plumb, Jadeja and his arm ball on fire, tossed up, drawing the batsman forward, Patel playing for the straightening, the ball carries in to hit him in front of off
full, pushed back to the bowler
stabs forward at a tossed up delivery
straight one from Ashwin, punched off the back foot past cover
flighted full, swept behind square leg
good length, defended from the crease
nice flight from Ashwin, dips as he comes forward and defends
flighted full on middle and leg, pushed to long on
straightening on middle stump, played  back from the crease
some turn just outside off, defended off the front foot
more front-foot defence outside off
good length ball forced back to the bowler
that hurried in, but was handled well, Bresnan taking it from off stump and guiding it late past short thrd
length offbreak punched back, Ashwin stops it with his foot to his right
worked off the pads through square for an easy two
spinning down the leg side from around off, awkwardly worked behind square leg
Ashwin getting some turn, punched wide of long on from a good length
quick, full into the pads, another easy single to square leg
ending on middle with sharp turn from outside off, played to midwicket
flighted from wide of the crease, straightens on the stumps, blocked
quicker and angled in, thick inside edge to square leg
stayed a touch low and came in to off stump, punched back to the bowler
sharp turn outside off, thick outside edge past the man at slip
straightening quickly on middle stump, defended off a thick inside edge
gets him to drive a tossed up ball outside off, to extra cover
turning down the leg side from off stump again from Ashwin, worked through midwicket
thick inside edge as he tries to force it through leg, short midwicket fields
lots of turn again, but his original line sending it down leg, nudged to fine leg
middle stump now, whipped away, sharp stop by virat at short miwicket
flat, leg stump, worked to deep square leg
tight line now on off stump, pushed back to the bowler from the crease
pitched up, and a thick edge right away off an attempted drive, past slip to third man
short, and pulled away without any trouble at all, to deep square
good length, played out solidly to extra cover
tries to work a back of a length ball through midwicket, inside edges it onto the pitch
goes full for the blockhole, low full toss whipped straight to wide mid on
pitched up full on off stump, mistimed drive to mid off
flighted full on leg stump, worked to midwicket
spins in from outside off, punched back to the bowler
beaten as he lunges forward to sweep, ball dribbles away on the off side
has him pushing in the air, but wide of extra cover
that didn;t get up much, Bresnan surprised but manages to stab it away off the toe end of the bat
fine drive on the up, to sweeper cover
comes down the pitch, tries to run it through the off side, point is in the way
trying to dab it from very close to the body, underedge on the bounce to the keeper
bangs in the bouncer, 135.4 kph, Root lets it go over in the end
drives a pitched up delivery to extra cover, held its line there a tad on off
good length, on middle, played out to midwicket
spinning a couple of feet down leg, would have been a wide had it not been nudged square
pushes back a length offbreak to the bowler
thick outside edge now to a straighter one, to short third man
slow-sweep, cracking connection, but Rohit, who is on for Yuvraj, runs across, and dives to save the boundary
down the pads once more, and worked to fine leg
tossed up generously, hit down to long on
sweeps well from leg stump, down to deep backward square
tossed up on off and middle, Bresnan right forward to defend
width outside off, bounce too but Bresnan able to go back and cut it behind backward point
that squared him up, angled in to leg, and then spits past the bat, thick edge as Bresnan plays softly
pushed back to the bowler
fine control from Jadeja, another flighted delivery around off, smothered down the pitch
tries a reverse sweep to a tossed up bal, ends up playing it to extra cover
width outside off now, and put away through point
tossed up an dipping on the batsman, played out to midwicket
offbreak into the pads, worked down to short fine
right forward to squeeze a length ball wide of covers
defends a flighted delivery, bat and pad close together
yes, no, misfield, no single taken in the end, after Root runs a length ball to point
too wide from Ishant, and cut wide of third man for a couple
more width, and this time, Root has got enough power on the cut to beat third man

got him now, the wide delivery working for Ishant third time, fuller this time, and Root was drawn forward at it, played away from the body with an open face, hint of away movement, and and a tumbling Dhoni snaps up the outside edge, steadying stand broken
beats the outside edge with a good length ball going across the left-hander
130 kph good length outside off, played to point
full delivery pushed to extra cover

classic from Ashwin, what a refreshing delivery coming from him, tossed up outside off, inviting the drive, Bresnan feeling for it away from the body, and it spins in to bowl him through the gate, Graeme Swann would have been proud, so would have been Prasanna
bowled full on the pads, worked to midwicket
defended off the front foot
not bad at all from Finn, whipped with the spin down to long on
good length, played softly to extra cover
pitched up, squeezed out to point off the front foot
short, but down the leg side
another bouncer, shorter this time, more bounce too, but no use as the line is down leg
calm defence from Tredell, Ishant finally back to good length around off
around off stump once more, he runs it to point
Ishant gets the edge finally, but Tredwell has played it softly enough for it to bounce in front of second slip
length ball rolls away off the pads square to the leg side
angled in from round the stumps, hits the pads
beats him on a half-hearted sweep with a slow tossed up ball outside off
angled in full to leg, and rolls away off the pads
flighted outside off, pushed to point
drags an attempted drive down the leg side with a thick inside edge, straighter one from Ashwin
wayward throw, and run out chance missed, Finn really slow to start after Tredwell runs up for a single, but the fast bowler makes it after a poor, wide throw to Ashwin from square leg, Raina it is
takes a step forward and defends a delivery on off
on the bounce to long on running to his right as Tredwell finally decides to abandon defence
pushed off the front foot to short midwicket, who denies the single with a dive, Raina again
appeal for leg before now, but it was headed down leg comfortably as Finn was caught on the crease
played out to the leg side
widish outside off, slapped away to sweeper cover
good length, played back to the bowler from off
cannot get it past the bowler again
stabbed back to Raina, third time in succession

Finn has picked out deep midwicket with the slog sweep and Dhoni is clapping with the big gloves, one of those days for him where everything has worked, after all the defending, England's attempt to get some runs ends in a wicket
punched back to the bowler to end a successful first over for Raina
quicker delivery pushed off the front foot to extra cover

Jadeja ending the innings with another arm ball, all three of his wickets have come with it, pushed through on a good length, angled in, and enough of a gate on Dernbach's forward push to hit the stumps

inn2.comm: back of a length, away movement, but way outside off stump
almost in trouble., Gambhir, with a leading edge to extra cover as he looks to a work a full delivery to leg, done in by the away seam movement, but the ball has gone in the gap
left alone outside off as Finn gets it to lift from a length
fine leave, much closer to off from Finn, pitched up too, Gambhir shouldering arms confidently
opened up by the away shape from back of a length, and he ends up dabbing it towards point even as he hops

loud appeal for leg before, umpire Ravi unmoved, Rahane going nowhere with his feet, just pushing half-heartedly from the crease, this is the way he fell in Kochi too, but this length ball struck him a touch high
left alone outside off
full and right on off to start with, Gambhir hurried into a defensive push, wants the single, is sent back
Dernbach running in with purpose, 138 kph, pushed out to the off side from the crease
wide from Dernbach, too wide, and Gambhir has crunched it past a diving backward point
the angle across the left-hander making him drive, without much timing to wide mid off
139.9 kph and has Gambhir prodding and getting beaten outside off with one that zips across from short of a length
not much room, but Gambhir sends it racing to third man with a steer
whoa, Gambhir backs away to leg and comes charging out to Finn, who beats him a by a mile with an away swinging length ball, what a brain fade
straight, good length, and down the leg side
good leave, back of a length, rising outside off, in the area where Gambhir loves to dab 'em to third man, but he lets it go emphatically this time
and here is the dab, moving across him from short of a length again, and he could not resist the shot, the line was closer to him, ball goes to third man
defended solidly to cover

Kochi all over again for Rahane and Finn, who rips in a good length delivery through the young batsman's gate, Rahane seemed to have got slightly forward this time, but still left too much between bat and pad, off stump is uprooted
rapped on the pads first ball, Kohli survives as England can't convince umpire Ravi, who has made a fine decision, the length ball was headed down leg stump
down the leg side to the left-hander
pitched up, Gambhir bends forward low and defends it
driven, but not much timing on it, and mid off will cut it off to his right
139.9 kph bouncer from Dernbach, bury those slower ones for now, Kohli gets his head out of the way just in time
length ball played out to midwicket
works a length ball with the angle to midwicket and is away with one
good length, turned to square leg
goes across and defends tightly to off
thick inside edge onto pad as Kohli plays half-forward to a good length ball angling in
holds its line outside off stump, good length, Kohli lets it go
just back of a length, works it off the pad through square leg
Gambhir leaving well once more, good to see that, angled delivery just outside off
too far down the pads and Gambhir makes sure he does not let it go waste, with a meaty tuck to the deep square leg rope
back of a length, dropped in front of short midwicket
Kohli going after a short ball outside off, and a thick edge flies over the keeper
short, around chest height, another attempt at a pull, and this time a swivelling Kohli smashes it to the deep square leg boundary
Dernbach goes full, but angles it into the pads, and Kohli flicks it with bat well in front of pad, not far from a diving square leg, but safe in the end
140.7 kph good length from Dernbach outside off, holding its line too, Kohli lets it go wisely
similar delivery, more bounce now, Kohli lets it go once again, he's done for this over
angled across Gambhir, back of a length, he tries to cut it behind point, but there are two men in that region, and the finer of the two takes it on the bounce
into the pads, length delivery, and rolls away behind square
pushed off the front foot to covers for a single
left alone as it goes across him some way outside off
goes across and defends one angled in to off stump
shaping down the leg side, keeper going up in appeal for caught behind with enthusiasm, not given, not called a wide either
lovely, Kohli following the away movement on this wide pitched up delivery, and opening the face late to drive it in the gap at cover
gets forward, opens the face and runs a length ball to third man
holding its line from a length, but on the pads, and sent down to fine leg
straightening and rising outside off stump, left alone
gets across and outside off and earns a single with a steer to third man
worked to fine leg off the pad
back of a length, runs it to one of the two backward points
width outside off, Gambhir goes after it, the fury in his slash, and the bounce generated by Finn, take the ball comfortably over the reach of the slips
left alone outside off now
excellent delivery, angled in from wide of the crease, and changes direction sharply to swerve away after pitching on a length, left alone

huge, long appeal from England, especially KP who runs in from gully to take the 'catch', but replays shows it is off a hopping Gambhir's thigh pad, batsman curiously raising his bat while the appeal was on
holds its line widish outside off, allowed to go to the keeper
pitched up, straightening again, defended solidly off the front foot
reaches out to a bouncing back of a length ball outside off, sends it in the air, but wide of point, to third man
pitched up right on off and middle, Gambhir in solid front foot defence
pushes forward to cover, wants the single, there is no chance of that
gets one on the pads and tucks it in front of square for two
gets behind the line around off and defends a nippy short of a length ball
pitched up now, Kohli upto it, on the front foot and defending it to the bowler
stinging push to a pitched up delivery, wide mid on has absolutely no chance of preventing that from speeding to the straight boundary
outstanding comeback from Finn, quick, sharp, short, into Kohli, who manages to gets his body out of the line, but leaves the bat hanging up, and the edge flies over the keeper
allows a length ball to rise outside off and sends it to third man
length ball played out to point
worked square to the leg side and he wants the single, but the fielder as already got to the ball
Kohli moving forward nicely now, Bresnan pitching it up, Kohli pushing it back firmly
hits the bat hard from a good length and rolls away to point
big stride forward, head on top of the ball, defends it to the off side
half forward and across now to block a length ball around off
back of a length, pushed softly in front of cover for a single
fails to work it away through square leg as it moves in from back of a length, hit on the thigh pad
angled down the pads, but Kohli cannot beat fine leg
another fine leave from Gambhir, he's done that alright today, angled in from round the stumps, rising from short of a length, he shoulders arms
good length, jabbed away to square leg as it comes in with the angle
no dab this one, thick edge produced by Finn as Gambhir tries to defend a length ball, away to third man
short, outside off, Gambhir's attempt to pull it rolls weakly at mid on
diving stop at backward point, Gambhir had timed his steer neatly
good length, pushed firmly but straight to extra cover
nudged to square leg
beaten as he has a go at the cut to one leaving him outside off
pitched up around off, played out from the crease
short, down the leg side, and Kohli gloves the pull down the leg side, hasn;t backed away to the short ball, hasn;t looked quite in total control as well
pushed to midwicket
misfield at point gives Kohli two, Morgan letting it through his hands
short again, into Kohli, who plays it well now, pulling along the ground to deep square
left alone outside off stump as it holds its line from round the stumps
Gambhir tested by the short ball now, and manages to drag an awkward pull past square leg
tossed up a bit and angled in to the left-hander, defended off a thick inside edge
worked in front of square leg from the crease
bashed straight back to the bowler off the back foot
goes across with the front foot and runs it towards point
quicker this time, but Kohli quick to rock back too, and cuts it hard through point, there is a man in the deep
slower now, and he finds backward point with the steer
Gambhir getting it away first ball after drinks, slight width on a good length, and he drives it through point, who gives up the chase early
short, above shoulder height, and pulled away through square leg
Kohli starting to have that settled look about his innings, across to defend a length ball
worked to square leg
back of a length, pushed down the pitch
uses the angle to work it on the leg side, straight to square leg
slow through the air, on off stump, defended
worked to midwicket from the crease
Gambhir gives it away against spin, charges out and heaves it wide of mid on, who takes a few steps to his left, and takes a head-high catch quite safely
on the front foot to defend it outside off
blocked off the front foot
plays it awkwardly to cover from the crease
good length outside off, he goes across and defends it solidly
angled in a bit now, on off stump, more defence from Kohli
cracker of a pull, Bresnan banging it in short, ball not rising above waist height, and Kohli thumps it over midwicket
fuller into the pads, worked to deep square leg, Kohli races for the run, he'll get only that much
uncertain from Yuvraj, who almost plays on as he pushes far from the body at a length ball, Bresnan thought he had him
an edgy drive now, but falling well short of point
goes forward to a flighted one outside off and whips it to midwicket
punches a length ball back to the bowler from the crease
that turned in sharply, Kohli was backing away, mistimes it to mid off
worked square on leg and enough time to take two
he is doing it his way now, whipping from outside off through midwicket, and that is also his 4000th ODI run, the second-quickest to get there
that should help Yuvraj, he's quite a nervy starter, comes out and dismisses it in the air over extra cover
and next ball after getting to 4000, he reaches his fifty with a couple through square leg
too far down the leg side, slower one at 118 kph
Kohli in autopilot now, opens the face and runs it to square third man
not that short, it is the slow offcutter, Yuvraj has picked it up and sent it soaring over midwicket, it has almost gone all the way
goes back to work a pitched up delivery to leg
meaty push from the crease, just past extra cover for two more
quick bouncer from Bresnan, Yuvraj pulls out of the way late
flat, good length, he's started going back often now, finds extra cover this time
again he punches off the back foot, again to extra cover
down the track, to the pitch of the tossed up ball and sends it out of long on's reach
Tredwell goes flat and shortish next ball and Kohli whips it out to deep midwicket
Yuvraj lunging down for the sweep, it is angled in full towards his pads, he has to adjust late, does
now reaching the pitch with a sharp front foot movement, extra cover takes pace off the drive
that almost sped to the third man rope, Kohli opening the face late and timing it, stopped inches from the boundary
flicked in the gap at midwicket, that didn;t look like it was timed well, but Finn has ended up chasing it to the rope, Dernbach not happy
punches a length ball from the crease to mid off
another flowing, big followthrough of a push to mid off
hurried into the pull with a 137.8 kph short ball, Yuvraj getting it just over midwicket in the end
boundaries all around now, Yuvraj pinging the deep extra cover rope with a picture-perfect pose of a drive, much like Eoin Morgan had earlier today
cut away to sweeper cover
on the front foot to run it with the spin to point
punches a flat one down to long on
worked out to midwicket from the crease
Kohli putting on quite a display tonight, skips out, reaches the pitch, and lofts it over midwicket
that spun, from middle past Kohli's bat and down the leg side
cuts hard, but on the bounce to point
gets lovelier and lovelier, the Kohli show, gap split between extra cover and mid off now, with half a stride forward and a solid drive
runs a slower one down to third man
banged in short, too short by Dernbach
Yuvraj sends this slower, full delivery screaming to the deep extra cover rope with a powerful drive
another boundary, surely Dernbach's place has to be questioned now, harmless short ball, not getting up much, and Yuvraj sends it through square leg with a quick swivel on a leg
punched to extra cover
down the track, Tredwell shortens the length, Kohli works it to deep square
Yuvraj falling to spin, not for the last time, pushing forward inside the line, and off stump is knocked back as Tredwell straightens it from round the stumps
on the front foot and works it to midwicket
that spun in a mile, Dhoni getting across and outside off, and hit on the pad
moves across again and works it to square leg
short of a length into the pads, and tucked wide of fine leg for two
across, behind the line, and defending a good length ball
very well controlled by Kohli, short ball dug into him, he swivels across on a leg and it needs a dive from fine leg to save the pull from flying into the boundary

my goodness, Dhoni has given this length ball such a fearful thump from the crease, that even after clattering into the non-striker's stumps, it has enough steam to lure mid off all the way to the straight boundary
top edge of a pull, but well short of fine leg
worked to midwicket
worked with the turn to midwicket
mistimes it off the back foot to covers
down the track, Tredwell shortens it, nudged to midwicket
pushing it through quick again, Dhoni has to stay back and chops it away
flat and quick it is once more, steered to short third
keeps strike with a tuck to deep square leg, Tredwell denying him the chance to charge out
short, and the India captain ends it at his home ground with a powerful pull to the deep square leg boundary
